anya-e0806n0:15_0: Icceva manavasesa mattano bhayādyūpaddavopaghābhakarasāmatthiya yogena sakalajjhattikabāhiyantarāya nivāraṇa madhippetasiddhi visesa mabhikaṅkhiya ratanattaya visayabhūtaṁ taṁsādhane kantanidāna bhūtassa ālokiyayātisayaguṇavisesayuttassa mahato pyatimahanīyassa ratanattayassa sappasādānurūpaṁ pūjāvisayaṁ tadanussa(raṇaṁ katvā) gurusanniyogamanuṭṭhātuṁ–
anya-e0806n0:18_0: Vacanato attano gurupūjā purassaraṁ pañcikāvivaraṇaṁ pathi’yā pañcikā’tiādinā katapaṭiññattā sampati mahādayotiādino ganthassa sādhujanavaṇṇanaṁ vaṇṇanamārabhissāma.
anya-e0806n0:19_0: Nanu ca vuttiganthassa vaṇṇanāyaṁ katābhiniveso-yamācariyoti kathamihānadhikate mahādayotiādike paṭipannoti ratanattappaṇāmaganthakattuganthanissayaganthārambhaphalaabhidheyyasaṅkhāta- payojanasotujanasamussāhanānaṁ sandassanatthaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:19_1: Tattha ratanattayappaṇāma karaṇaṁ antarāyakarāpuññavighātakarapuññavisesuppādanena kattu micchitassa ganthassa anantarāyenaṁ parisamāpanatthaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:19_2: Vacīpaṇāmo panettha sotūnampi yathāvuttatthanipphādanako ācariyenāpyaya mattho dassitoyeva’tattha ratanattayappaṇāmasandassana’ntiādinā,
anya-e0806n0:19_3: vācasikasatthādhikāratopi vacīpaṇāmoti kāyappaṇāmo manopaṇāmo ca. Na kato,
anya-e0806n0:19_7: abhidheyyasaṅkhātayayojanasandassanaṁ vīmaṁsāpubbakārīnaṁ payojano pālambhapubbikā satthe pavattatīti sotujanasamussāhanaṁ (katvā) ādarena ganthe pavattanatthaṁ, yadāhu –
anya-e0806n0:20_0: Sabbasseva hi satthassa, kammassāpi ca kassaci;
anya-e0806n0:22_0: Nanu satthappayojanānaṁ sambandhopi vattabbo idamassa payojananti yato–
anya-e0806n0:27_0: Taṁ vuttantogadhattā na, bhinno vutto payojanāti.
anya-e0806n0:28_0: Payojanappayojanampana sāmatthiyaladdhabbaṁ sayamācariyena ‘‘ko pana saddalakkhaṇassa ajānane doso’’tiādinā vuttanayena viññātabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:29_3: ‘saṅkhepanayenā’tica ‘sārabhūtaṁ vipulatthagā hiṁ anākula’nti ca imehi ganthārambhaphalaṁ sotujanasamussāhanañca,
anya-e0806n0:29_4: abhidheyyasaṅkhātappayojanampana‘saṁvaṇṇana’nti iminā dassitaṁ anvattha byapadesena saṁvaṇṇīyati vivaritvā vitthāretvā kathīyati attho etāyāti saṁvaṇṇanābhi katvā,
anya-e0806n0:29_5: tampana vivaritvā kathanaṁ saddānusāsanasatthasannissayattā abhidheyyo nāma samuditena satthena vacanīyattho taṁ vacanīyatthoti (potthake) vuttasaddānusiṭṭhisaṅkhātapayojanamevāti ayamettha samudāyattho.
anya-e0806n0:30_0: Ayampanettha avayavattho-yoti aniyamavacanaṁ dhammarājasaddā pekkhāya cettha pulliṅgatā,
anya-e0806n0:30_2: dayati dukkhaṁ apanetvā paresaṁ sukhaṁ dadāti,
anya-e0806n0:30_3: dayīyati vā sappurisehi gamiya(ti sa) santāne pavattīyati,
anya-e0806n0:30_5: dayati vā paradukkhaṁ gaṇhāti taṁvasena attano hadayakhedaṁ karotīti dayā,
anya-e0806n0:30_7: visayamahantatāya mahatī pasatthā vā dayā assāti mahādayo,
anya-e0806n0:30_10: iminā khīṇāsavāpi saṅgayhanti tesampi diṭṭhadhammikasukhavihārasaṅkhāta hitassa dānato,
anya-e0806n0:30_11: janānaṁ samūho janatā tassā hitāya abhivaḍḍhiyā sakalavaṭṭa dukkhanissaṭanibbānasukhabhāgiyakaraṇāyāti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:30_13: sambodhīti ettha saṁsaddo sāmanti imamatthaṁ dīpeti,
anya-e0806n0:30_14: tasmā saṁsayameva anaññabodhito hutvā cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhati etāyāti sambodhi,
anya-e0806n0:30_16: savāsanasakalasaṁkilesappahāyakaṁ bhagavato arahattamaggaññāṇaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇantipi vadanti, sampāpayatīti sampāpakaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:30_18: kinti dhammajātaṁ dhammasaddenettha pāramidhammā pañcamahāpariccāgādayo ca adhippetā,
anya-e0806n0:30_19: tepi hi attānaṁ dhārentaṁ dhārenti sambodhi sampāpanasāmatthiyayogena parepi dhārenti nāmāti dhammāti vuccanti,
anya-e0806n0:30_21: viyādisuttena ṇvādi(ko) mappaccayo, dhammānaṁjātaṁ, dhammāevavā jātaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:30_24: sampūrayanti payogasampattiyogā dīpaṅkara (pāda)mūle hatthopagatampi nibbānampahāya yathāvuttakaruṇāguṇayogasītalībhūtahadayatāya ‘‘kathannāmete accanta dussahavaṭṭadukkhopagate satte taṁmahādukkhā mocessāmī’’ti vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇekahetutāya sammā pūrento vaḍḍhento vuḍḍhiṁ virūḷhaṁ vepullaṁ gamentoti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:30_27: duṭṭhu khanati kāyikaṁ assādanti’dupubbā khanismā’ ‘‘kvī’’ti (5-4) kvi, dukkhaṁ kāyikadukkha vedanā,
anya-e0806n0:30_31: tasmā anantaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo assāti anantarūpaṁ, taṁ dukkhaṁ anubhavī vindī, kimivāti āha-‘sukhaṁ vā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:30_35: kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti ‘‘aniṭṭhānubhavanasabhāvāyāpi dukkhavedanāya anubhavanasabhāvasāmaññena ajjhāsayasampattivisesayogā mahākāruṇikassa sukhena sadisatāpattihotīti dukkhampi samānaṁ taṁ sukhamiva vindī’’ti.
anya-e0806n0:30_37: athavā sukhamiva sukhaṁ vindanto viya anaññavindiyamapi tādisaṁ dukkhaṁ sakalalokahitāva hitamanatāya vindīti attho, tenāha ‘akhinnarūpo’ti,
anya-e0806n0:30_38: akhinnaṁ parissamamappattaṁ rūpaṁ sabhāvo assāti viggaho.
anya-e0806n0:31_0: Taṁ dhammarājanti yoti aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa vuttaguṇavisesādhāra puggalassaniyamanavacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_2: attanā paṭividdhassa sāmibhāvena dhammassa rājā sāmīti vā,
anya-e0806n0:31_3: attanā paṭivijjhiyamāne dhamme paṭivijjhantova tattha rājati dippatīti vā,
anya-e0806n0:31_4: parūpakāravasena tadatthāyeva paṭipannattā paresaṁ dhammaṁ rājeti pakāsetīti vā dhammarājā,
anya-e0806n0:31_5: taṁ dhammarājaṁ namitvāti sambandho, namassitvāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:31_7: Tattha māro ca so vīrocāti māravīro jito vidtedhastabalo māravīro nāti jitamāravīro, taṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_9: tathāpi vīrasaddasannidhānena devaputtamāre gahite taṁvijayā aññepi jitā eva nāma hontīti viññeyyaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:31_10: suṭṭhu dhantaṁ dhamitaṁ uddharitaṁ sudhantaṁ, suvaṇṇameva sovaṇṇaṁ, sudhanta ca taṁ sovaṇṇañca,
anya-e0806n0:31_12: athavā sudhantañca taṁ suvaṇṇaṁ ceti samāse tassidanti ‘‘ṇo’’ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye ‘‘majjhe’’ti (4-126) majjhavuddhiyaṁ sudhantasovaṇṇaṁ paṭimārūpaṁ, tena nibho sadiso, taṁ.
anya-e0806n0:33_0: Hetu phalaṁ parattho ca, sabbopi thutisaṅgaho;
anya-e0806n0:35_0: Vuttahetuphalasattopakāravasena buddharatanassa thutipubbakampaṇāmaṁ dassetvā idāni dhammarājena tenāpi pūjanīyassa dhammaratanassa nipaccakāraṁ dassetuṁ‘dhammañca mohandhatamappadhaṁsi’nti āha,
anya-e0806n0:35_1: tattha ca saddo ‘dhammañca namitvā’ti namassitvā (potthake) namassanakriyāya dhammaṁ sampiṇḍeti, kimbhūtanti āha, ‘mohandhatamappadhaṁsi’nti, muyhatīti moho=aññāṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:35_5: taṁ padhaṁseti pakārena nāseti sīlenāti mohandhatamappadhaṁsī,
anya-e0806n0:35_6: pasaddassapakāsanatthaṁ hitvā pakāratthasseva gahaṇato pariyattiyā saha–
anya-e0806n0:37_0: Cattāri atha nibbānaṁ, dhammā lokuttarā navāti.
anya-e0806n0:38_4: tappahānasmiñhi vuccamāne tammukhenetaresampi pahānaṁ vuttameva hotīti.
anya-e0806n0:39_0: Evaṁ dhammaratanassa namakkāraṁ dassetvā idāni tadādhārabhūtasaṅgharatanaṁ namassituṁ ‘saṅghaṁ tathā saṅghaṭitaṁ guṇehī’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:39_1: tattha tathāsaddo samuccaye vā, vacoyuttiyaṁ vā,
anya-e0806n0:39_4: saṁpubbato hanatismā kvimhi ‘‘kvimhi ghoparipaccasamo hī’’ti (5.100) hanassa gho,
anya-e0806n0:40_0: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phaleṭhitā;
anya-e0806n0:43_0: Evamanantarāyena ganthaparisamāpanatthamananta guṇavisiṭṭhalokattayaggasīkhāmaṇibhūtassa ratanattayassa paṇāmaṁ dassetvā idāni gantha kattādiyathāvuttatthopadassana pubbaṅgamamattanā samārabhitabbaṁ gantha karaṇaṁ paṭiññātukāmo’yo iddhimantesū’tiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:43_2: etāya sattā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṁsagatā hontīti iddhi=iddhividhādayo lokiyā lokuttarā ca sā etesamatthīti iddhimanto, tesu iddhimantesu,
anya-e0806n0:43_5: tannāmadheyyenāti tasseva nāmadheyyamassāti tannāmadheyyo, tena, tapodhanenāti muninā,
anya-e0806n0:43_6: kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti- ‘‘etadaggaṁ bhikkhave mama sāvakānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ iddhimantānaṁ yadidaṁ moggallāno’’ti bhagavatā iddhimantesu etadagge ṭhapito mahāmoggallānatthero nāma yo dutiyo aggasāvako… (tena samānanāmadheyyenāti) tamapadisanto-yamācariyo anuddhatabhāvena ujunākkamena nāmādikamavatvā vaṅkavuttiyā attano moggallānoti nāmaṁ mahāsāmiṭṭhānantarappattiṁ kālocitapaññā veyyattiyaṁ buddhasāsanopakāritādiñca vibhāveti. ‘Yaṁ racita’nti sambandho, racitanti kataṁ, kinti āha saddasattha’nti, saddasatthaṁ nāma sutta,
anya-e0806n0:43_8: suttaṁ(hi) ‘saddā (lakkhīyanti) sāsīyanti anusāsīyanti pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya etenā’ti saddalakkhaṇanti ca ‘byākarīyanti saddanipphādanavasena kathīyanti etenā’ti byākaraṇanti ca vuccati,
anya-e0806n0:43_9: aparampana vutyādi tadupakaraṇabhāvena saddasatthaṁ saddalakkhaṇaṁ byākaraṇanti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ, anunanti tabbisesanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:43_10: asesalakkhiyopasaṅgāhakabhāvena vattabbassāparassābhāvā sampuṇṇanti attho, athāti anantaratthe nipāto,
anya-e0806n0:44_1: saṅgahetvā saddavasena saṅkucitaṁ viya katvā khipanaṁ saṅkhepo,
anya-e0806n0:44_3: bhovāti yo saddasatthassa vuttiyā ca kattā so eva,
anya-e0806n0:44_5: samārabheyya sammā ārambhaṁ kareyya bahunnaṁ kriyākkhaṇānamādibhūtaṁ kriyākkhaṇamanutiṭṭheyya, kinti saṁvaṇṇanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:44_7: pañcīyati vipañcīyati byattī karīyati vutti attho etāyāti vā,
anya-e0806n0:45_0: Evamattanā karaṇīyasatthampaṭijānitvā tadanantaraṁ ‘‘dve me bhikkhave paccayā sammādiṭṭhiyā uppādāya (katame dve) parato ca ghoso (ajjhattañca) yoniso manasikāro’’ti vacanato sammāsavanapaṭibaddhā sabbāpi sāsana (ppaṭi) sampattīti sāsanappaṭipattiyā byākaraṇassa mūlakāraṇattā taṁ savane sādhujane niyojento ‘taṁ sārabhūta’ntiādimāha,
anya-e0806n0:45_1: tattha tanti yasaddavirahepi adhikatattā saṁvaṇṇanaṁ parāmasati, taṁ suṇantū’ti sambandho,
anya-e0806n0:45_3: byañjanānurūpañca atthaṁsallakkhetvā anaññamanā hutvā sakkaccaṁ suṇantūti attho suvaṇṇabhājane nikkhittasīhavasāviya avinassamānaṁ katvā hadaye ṭhapanavasena,
anya-e0806n0:45_6: tathā sātisayabyākaraṇaṁ… tathāvidhā eva sappurisā sādhukaṁ sotukāmā hontīti,
anya-e0806n0:45_9: phegguttābhāvena apariccajanīyatāya sāro thiraṁ so attho byañjanañca assā atthīti sārā ca sā bhūtāca,
anya-e0806n0:45_10: atha vā lokiyalokuttaraguṇātisayasādhanekasādhanabhāvato seṭṭhaṭṭhena sārañca sā bhūtācāti sārabhūtā,
anya-e0806n0:45_12: attho pana nayaggāhitatāyapi sabbathā dassitoyevāti vipulaṁ atthaṁ gaṇhātīti vipulatthagāhī, taṁ,
anya-e0806n0:45_13: vidhīyamānavaṇṇanākkamavisesena byākulassa vaṇṇanākkamassa nirasanato natthi ākulaṁ kiñci assāti anākulaṁ, taṁ,
anya-e0806n0:45_14: iminā ca kaccāyanavuttivaṇṇanāsu na tathābhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0806n0:46_0: Tadevamadhikatattāyevāyamācariyo ganthārambhe’mahādayo yo’tiādike paṭipajjitvā dāni attanā vaṇṇanīyassa ganthassādi bhūtaṁ vākyamanadhikataparihāramukhenevopanyasya byākhyātumāha- ‘idhā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:46_3: māgadhikaṁ saddalakkhaṇanti visesana samāso, viracayitukāmoti kattukāmo, ratiṁjanetīti ratanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:46_4: ramayatī ra tayatī (potthake) ti (vā) ratanaṁ anappaccayena,
anya-e0806n0:46_5: athavā yaṁ loke cittīkatādikaṁ ratananti vuccati,
anya-e0806n0:46_6: idampi taṁ sadisatāya ratananti vuccati, tathācāhu–
anya-e0806n0:49_0: Buddhādīnametamadhivacanaṁ, tayo avayavā assāti tayaṁ, samudāyo,
anya-e0806n0:49_2: avayavavinimmuttassa pana samudāyassa abhāvato tīṇi eva ratanāni vuccanti, paṇamanaṁ paṇāmo, ratanattayaguṇaninnatā, paṇamanti etāyāti vā paṇāmo,
anya-e0806n0:49_6: yena ca yo paṭipādīyati so tassa attho hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:49_10: tassa sandassanaṁ attho yassāti aññapadattho, kintaṁ vākyaṁ, tā vāti vākyālaṅkāre,
anya-e0806n0:49_12: kāyamanomayenāpi puññāti sayappattiyā abhisamīhitatthasiddhi hotevāti codanaṁ manasi nidhāya vacīpaṇāmassa paratthasannissayatañca tasseva vibhāgena payojanañca dassetumāha- ‘tattha’iccādi,
anya-e0806n0:49_13: guṇasaddo ettha ‘‘sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhā’’tiādīsu viya ānisaṁsaṭṭho,
anya-e0806n0:49_20: tappaṇāmakaraṇena anuguṇa…pe… santānaṁ yesanti aññapadattho, tesaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:49_21: yathā te sotāro ratanattayassa paṇāmakaraṇena puññātisayappaṭilābhā anekānisaṁsātisayappaṭilābhānukūla cittasantānatāya padhānataracittasantānā honti,
anya-e0806n0:49_24: adhigatā pattā aneke bahū ānisaṁsavisesā āyu vaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo yesanti viggaho,
anya-e0806n0:49_25: visositā sukkhāpitā antarāyā bhayādayo ajjhattikā bāhiyā vā yesaṁ tathāvidhānaṁ sotūnaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:49_27: abhisamīhitassa anuṭṭhitassa kataniṭṭhitassa ganthassa avabodhoyeva phalaṁ, tassa sijjhanatthaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_1: paratthe sampādite pana sakattho sampannova nāma siyāti manasi katvā āha- ‘etadevā’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:52_2: Kāyamanosamācaraṇena sampajjamānañca vacīsamācaraṇena sampajjatevāti aneneva vākyena viññāyatīti avagantabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_3: buddhi pubbā yasmiṁ karaṇe taṁ buddhi pubbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_5: abhidheyyassa adhigamo jānanaṁ pubbo yassa so abhidheyyādhigamapubbako , avatāro pavatti,
anya-e0806n0:52_6: ekadesadassane ‘‘samuddo diṭṭho’’ti viya ekadesepi samudāyavohāradassanato pacchima pādenāti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_9: taṁ lakkhaṇaṁ sabhāvo assāti sādhiyasādhanalakkhaṇo, sādhiyassedaṁ sādhanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:52_10: sādhanassa cedaṁ sādhiyanti evamassedambhāvahetusabhāvo sambandhoti vuttaṁ hoti,
anya-e0806n0:52_12: tattha sambandhassantogadhattaṁ… sādhiyopadassanamukhena sādhanassāpi dassitattā nissayopadassanato, ussukkaṁ sammāvāyāmaṁ, buddhattaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ, pūretvāti–
anya-e0806n0:56_0: Vuttaaṭṭhadhammasamannāgatena abhinīhārena samannāgatā hutvā yathāvutte pāramitādayo dhamme pūretvāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:56_1: āgatāti sattattiṁsabodhipakkhiyadhammānubrūhanena āgatā, idhāti imasmiṁ loke, āgatāti pattā uppannā,
anya-e0806n0:56_2: tathāgatoti yathā sampati jātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena gatā,
anya-e0806n0:56_6: satta padāni gantvāna disā vilokesīti idaṁ ‘‘dhammatā esā bhikkhave sampati jāto bodhisattā samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā’’ti eva mādikāya pāḷiyā sattapadavītihārūpariṭhitassa sabbadisānuvilokanassa vuttattā vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:56_7: disā vilokesi samantatoti idampana ‘samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’nti etassa anantaraṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ… pādehi vasundharāphusanānantarameva dasadisāvalokitattā, aṭṭhaṅgāni nāma–
anya-e0806n0:59_3: evamādinātiādisaddena tesaṁ tesaṁ dhammānaṁ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṁ tathaṁ āgato yathāvato adhigato’yegatyatthā te buddhyatthā,
anya-e0806n0:59_4: ye buddhyā te gatyatthā’titathāgatoti evamādiṁ saṅgaṇhāti,
anya-e0806n0:59_6: tathāgatabhāvoti tathāgatoti bhavanaṁ nipphatti namassanakiriyābhisambandhāti’namassitvā’ti ettha namassanakiriyāya abhisambandhā iminā tathāgatādīnaṁ kammattaṁ vibhāveti,
anya-e0806n0:59_7: namassanakiriyāvisesanattāti ‘namassitvā’ti namassanaṁ katvāti vuttaṁ nāma siyāti namassananti vuttanamassanakiriyāya visesanattā,
anya-e0806n0:59_11: mūleti mūlasamīpe ‘‘yāva majjhanhike kāle chāyā pharati nivāte paṇṇāni patanti etāvatā rukkhamūlaṁ’’tiādīsu viya,
anya-e0806n0:59_12: nanu aññepi khīṇāsavā ‘aggamaggene’ccādinā vakkhamāna nayena nipphannā evāti anuyogaṁ manasikatvā vuttaṁ ‘saheva vāsanāyā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:59_13: na hi bhagavantaṁ ṭhapetvā aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṁ sakkonti,
anya-e0806n0:59_14: etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṁ bhagavato arahattanti dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:59_15: teneva iddhasaddassa atthaṁ dassento’tepi hi’ccādikaṁ vakkhati,
anya-e0806n0:59_16: kāpanāyaṁ vāsanā nāma pahīnakilesassāpi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanihito sāmatthiyaviseso’āyasmato pilindavacchassa vasalasamudācāranimittaṁ viya’,
anya-e0806n0:59_17: aggamaggenāti arahattamaggena, sabbakilese rāgādike, arahattaṁ aggaphalaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:59_18: sammuti upapattidevabhāvato aññena visuddhi devabhāvenātinipphannattā āha-‘visuddhidevabhāvenā’ti,
anya-e0806n0:59_19: sakalakilesakālussiyāpagamena visuddhippattiyā sabbaññuguṇā laṅkārena visuddhidevabhāvenāti attho.
anya-e0806n0:60_2: tepīti sāvakapaccekabuddhāpi, hi saddo hetumhi, yasmā aggaṁ…pe… anūnaguṇā , tasmāti attho,
anya-e0806n0:60_4: keci ‘siddho middhaguṇo assāti siddhamiddhaguṇanti duṭṭhamatthaṁ parikappetvā vākyamidaṁ dūsenti,
anya-e0806n0:60_5: te pana ‘middho nāma koci guṇo natthī’ti ca,
anya-e0806n0:60_6: ‘tathāgato nāma middha guṇo na hotī’ti ca,
anya-e0806n0:60_7: ‘tādiso ce siyā na ñāṇanissitapūjā pakatopayoginī bhavatī’ti ca ajānitvā vadatha tumhehi vatvā uyyojetabbā,
anya-e0806n0:60_10: dhammasaṅghānampīti iminā avayavena viggahepi samudāyassa samāsatthattā aññapadatthasamāsoyaṁ tagguṇasaṁviññāṇoti dīpeti, tenāha- ‘aññapadatthe’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:60_12: kiriyātisambandho vagamyate dhammasaṅghānaṁ guṇībhūtānampi tadavinābhāvittena namassanātisambandhā,
anya-e0806n0:60_14: puttena saha vattamānoti tagguṇasaṁviññāṇaaññapadatthasamāsattā tulyamubhinnampi āgamananti puttopi āgatoti patīyate,
anya-e0806n0:60_15: tatthāti niddhāraṇe sattadhī, attānanti dhammaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:60_18: kilesavaṭṭa kammavaṭṭa vipākavaṭṭavasena tayo vaṭṭā, tesu dukkhaṁ, tasmiṁ,
anya-e0806n0:60_20: tañca yathārūpaṁ kilesasamucchindanatappaṭippassaddhi ālambanabhāvena hotīti āha- ‘so…pe… vasenā’ti, navannampi,
anya-e0806n0:60_24: sīladiṭṭhisāmaññenāti ariyena sīlena ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena,
anya-e0806n0:60_26: tena te yatthakatthaci ṭhitāpi sahagatāvāti saṁhatoti imasmiṁ atthe saṅghoti padasiddhi daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0806n0:60_28: lokiyasīladiṭṭhiyā sāmaññena saṁhatattā sammutisaṅghopi paṇāmārahoyevāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0806n0:61_1: yesamidaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ bhāsissanti paṭiññātanti āha-‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti, ādisaddena rukkhādayo,
anya-e0806n0:61_3: ye lokasaṅketānurodhenātthappakāsakā tesaṁ sātthakāname vidaṁ lakkhaṇanti,
anya-e0806n0:61_4: apica ‘saddā ghaṭapaṭādayo’ti vadanto vedikānaṁ viya unti ñatthi (potthake) ādīnaṁ anupubbīniyamāvatthānamasambhavā tadanukkamena nipphādiyamānanampi saddānaṁ lokiyattānabhivattanañca bodhetīti daṭṭhabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_5: nu tattha pakāsakatthaṁ saddassa samudāyavasena vā siyā paccekavaṇṇavasena vā,
anya-e0806n0:61_8: tathā cāññesamakārādīnamanattha katā siyā, atha samuditā pakāsayeyyuṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_10: tathā sati katha matthaṁ saddo pakāsayatīti ce kamena sotacittādigahitakkhara pāḷiyā ca yo saddoti viññeyyo sātthako cittagocaro,
anya-e0806n0:61_11: cittagocarassāpi saddassa pana bālajanappabodhāya kappanāmattena pakatyādivibhāgato, na sabhāvenānvākhyānaṁ, tenāha-‘pakatyā’di ādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_12: nanu goiccādisādhusaddaniyame sati gotādayo asādhu saddāti viññāyanti gantabbamagganiyame agantabbamaggo viya,
anya-e0806n0:61_13: gotādi asādhusaddaniyame vā goiccādayo saddā sādhavoti agantabbamagganiyame gantabbamaggo viya,
anya-e0806n0:61_19: magadhesu viditāti imasmiṁ atthe ‘‘aññasmi’’nti (4-121) māgadhānaṁ idanti atthe ‘‘ṇo’’ti (4-34) ṇappaccaye māgadhā māgadhanti ca padanipphatti veditabbāti dassetumāha- ‘magadhesmi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_20: magadhesu viditātiādino adhippāyaṁ vivaritumāha- ‘idaṁ vuttaṁ hotī’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:61_21: tattha idanti idāni vakkhamānaṁ māgadhaṁ…pe… hotīti etaṁ vuttaṁ hotīti magadhesu…pe… lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhanti vadatā pakāsitaṁ hotīti attho,
anya-e0806n0:61_23: lakkhaṇaṁ visesayatāti saddalakkhaṇa saddassa uttarapadatthappadhānattā māgadhanti iminā lakkhaṇaṁ visesayatā byavacchedayatā vuttikārena, atthatoti sāmatthiyato,
anya-e0806n0:61_24: sadde ca visesito hotīti saddalakkhaṇasaddo māgadhe eva saddeeva (potthake) byavacchedito hoti,
anya-e0806n0:61_25: ayametthādhippāyo ‘magadhesu viditā māgadhāti sadde gahetvā tesamidaṁ māgadhanti māgadhasaddena yasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde lakkhaṇaṁ visesitaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:61_26: tasmā saddalakkhaṇasadde saddo yadi amāgadho kathaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ māgadhaṁ siyāti sāmatthiyā saddopi visesito hotī’ti,
anya-e0806n0:61_27: nanu māgadhanti lakkhaṇassa māgadha saddasambandhittajhāpanato saddalakkhaṇanti ettha saddasaddassa niratthaka tāpatti hotīti,
anya-e0806n0:61_28: na hoti gammamānatthassa saddassa payogampati kāmacārattā saddalakkhaṇasaddassa vā samāsatthe niruḷhattā ‘‘tatridaṁ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇa’’ntiādīsu viya,
anya-e0806n0:61_29: kopanātiādisaddalakkhaṇanti iminā abhidheyyasaṅkhātapayojanassa dassitattā tappayojanapucchanaparā codanā, vuccateccādi parihāro,
anya-e0806n0:62_0: Piyo ca garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e0806n0:64_0: Vuttehi tato parehi ca pasatthatarehi guṇavisesehi samupetaṁ guruṁ.
anya-e0806n0:67_0: Vacanato uṭṭhāna-upaṭṭhāna-paricariyā-sussūsā sakkaccasippapaṭiggahaṇehi sammā upaṭṭhahantena savana,uggahana-dhāraṇa-paripucchā-bhāvanā hi kaṅkhāvicchedaṁ katvā viññātabbaṁ saddalakkhaṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:67_1: tathā aviññātaṁ saddalakkhaṇamanenāti aviññātasaddalakkhaṇo puggalo, hisaddo avadhāraṇe,
anya-e0806n0:67_2: so ‘dhammavinayesu kusalo na hotī’ti ettha daṭṭhabbo, kusalo dakkho na hoti,
anya-e0806n0:67_3: tattha dhammavinayesu suttantātābhidhammasaṅkhātesu dhammesu ceva vinaye ca, kasmā–
anya-e0806n0:68_0: Yo niruttiṁ na sikkheyya, sikkhanto piṭakattayaṁ;
anya-e0806n0:70_1: ayametthādhippāyo ‘‘yathā vuttanayena sambhūtapada byāmohavasena padatthepi byāmohasambhavato suttantopadassitāya diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanāya ca abhidhammāgate nāmarūpaparicchede ca vinaya niddiṭṭhe saṁvarāsaṁvare ca akosallaṁ siyā’’ti,
anya-e0806n0:70_2: yathādhammanti dhammavinaya saddassa yo-ttho vinayasuttābhidhammasaṅkhāto, tassa so-ttho, tadanatikkamena,
anya-e0806n0:70_3: paṭipajjitumasakkontoti tatthatattheva vuttāsu adhisīla adhicitta adhipaññāsikkhāsu pavattituṁ asamattho,
anya-e0806n0:70_4: kusalo pana samattho paññāvisesālokapaṭilābhato, vuttaṁ hi–
anya-e0806n0:71_0: Yāva tiṭṭhanti suttantā, vinayo yāva dippati;
anya-e0806n0:72_0: Tāva dakkhanti ālokaṁ, sūriye abbhuggate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:73_0: Paṭipattinti paṭipajjīyatīti paṭipattīti yathāvuttaṁ tividhampi paṭipattiṁ, virādhetvāti nāsetvā,
anya-e0806n0:73_1: nassati hi paṭipatti tesuyevā ko sallatamagatattā, tathā cāhu–
anya-e0806n0:75_0: Tamo bhavissati loke, sūriye atthaṅgate yathāti.
anya-e0806n0:76_0: Saṁsāradukkhasseva bhāgī hoti… yathāvuttā-nukkamapariccāgena anurūpapaṭipattiyā paṭilabhitabbattā adhigamavisayassa visathattā (potthake) yo gakkhemassa,
anya-e0806n0:77_0: Suttante rakkhite sante, paṭipatti hoti rakkhitā;
anya-e0806n0:78_0: Paṭipattiyaṁ ṭhito dhīro, yogakkhemā na dhaṁsatīti.
anya-e0806n0:79_0: Etāvatā aviññātasaddalakkhaṇassa sakatthaparihāniṁ dassetvā idāni sakatthasampattimūlikā paratthasampattīti tadabhāvā tādiso puggalo paresampi paccayo bhavituṁ na sakkotīti dassetuṁ ‘nacā’tiādi vuttaṁ, patiṭṭhāti dhāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_1: tañcettha tesaṁ tesaṁ kula puttānaṁ dhammavinayasikkhāpanaṁ taṁtaṁ kammato nittharaṇādi ca,
anya-e0806n0:79_5: idha pana taṁ sādhanabhūto puggalo upacārato patiṭṭhāti gahetabbo,
anya-e0806n0:79_7: saddalakkhaṇaññūyevāti avadhāraṇampana tesu tabbidūyeva samatthoti dassanatthaṁ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_8: attano pana suguttasīlakkhandhavirahena kadāci koci yathāvuttānaṁ patiṭṭhābhavituṁ na sakkoti… tammūlakattā saddhammaṭṭhitiyā saparapatiṭṭhā bhāvassa ca,
anya-e0806n0:79_9: teneva vinayadhare ānisaṁsaṁ dassentena bhagavatā tappadhānaṁ tappamukhaṁva katvā ‘‘pañcime bhikkhave ānisaṁsā vinayadhara puggale,
anya-e0806n0:79_10: katame pañca attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti su rakkhito,
anya-e0806n0:79_20: atha khoti vidho saddhammopi nāsitoyevāti vatthumāha ‘ajānanto panā’tiādi,
anya-e0806n0:79_21: ayathāpaṭipajjamānoti saddalakkhaṇaññunā yathā yena pakārena atthānurūpaṁ byañjane byañjanānurūpañca atthe paṭipajjitabbaṁ, tathā appaṭipajjamāno,
anya-e0806n0:79_22: tathā ca vakkhati– tathā hi so saddalakkhaṇa majānanto’tiādi.
anya-e0806n0:79_25: terasa dhutaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dve asīti mahāvattānīti ayaṁ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n0:79_26: cattāro maggā cattāri ca phalāni ayaṁ adhigamasaddhammo nāma,
anya-e0806n0:79_28: tampi pāḷiyā thirīkātuṁ ‘vuttaṁ heta’ntiādimāha, tattha dhammāti hetū,
anya-e0806n0:79_32: byañjīyati attho etenāti byañjanaṁ-vākyaṁ athavā pajjate gamyate attho etenāti padaṁ-syādyantādi, vākyaṁva byañjanaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_34: dunnikkhittaṁ duṭṭhu nikkhittaṁ ṭhapitaṁ virādhetvā kathitaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:79_35: attho ca dunnītoti dunnikkhittattāyeva padabyañjanassa tabbacanīyopi duṭṭhuviññāto hoti,
anya-e0806n0:79_38: na hi attāva attanā veditabboti yuttanti.
anya-e0806n0:80_0: Tadevantiādinā yathāvuttaṁ nigametvā saññāvidhāne payojanaṁ dasseti, tanti hetvatthe nipāto,
anya-e0806n0:80_1: yasmā saddalakkhaṇassa jānanaṁsāni saṁsaṁ tasmāti attho, evanti nidassanatthe nipāto,
anya-e0806n0:80_5: Nanuca saññīnaṁ saññānaṁ vattabbatte ‘‘aādayo titālīsavaṇṇā’’tiādīnaṁ vākyānaṁ visuṁvisuṁ mahantattā kuto lāghavaṁ satthassāti maññamāno ‘tathāhi’ccādinā saññāvidhāne lāghavasabbhāvaṁ samattheti,
anya-e0806n0:80_6: hotevāti avadhāraṇena katthaci parasatthe viya no na hotīti dasseti,
anya-e0806n0:80_8: tathāhi ‘‘vaṇṇaparena savaṇṇopi’’ccādo (1-24) vaṇṇādisaññāsamuddharitā nāttānamattāvagametumalanti pare pucchitvā jānitabbā assa, tato saññā-vaseyā,
anya-e0806n0:80_9: tatossa saññāti saññāsaññīvivecanaṁ tadanuṭṭhānanti paramparāpekkhāya bhavitabbaṁ paṭipatti gāravābhāvā.
anya-e0806n0:80_10: Idāni saṅkhepato satthakkamaṁ dassetumāha-evaṁ tāvi’ccādi, tāvāti paṭhamaṁ,
anya-e0806n0:80_12: visayo gocaro yatthete syādayo vidhī yante, saha visayenāti savisayā,
anya-e0806n0:80_13: paṭhamaṁ karīyatīti pakati yato syādayo vidhīyante, saha pakatiyāti sappakatikā,
anya-e0806n0:80_15: liṅgebhavā liṅgikā-itthividhayo, ekatthībhāvo samāso, tena, sāmaññato samānattā,
anya-e0806n0:80_16: samānattantuṇādivuttiyā ‘‘rājādivisiṭṭhe purisā doviya’vasiṭṭhādivisiṭṭhe apaccādimhi atthe pavattanato.
